lead_paragraph: Mr. Steidtmann died three months after German prosecutors reopened an investigation into whether he had participated in massacres of thousands of Polish Jews.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Mr. Steidtmann died three months after German prosecutors reopened an investigation into whether he had participated in massacres of thousands of Polish Jews.

headline.main: Erich Steidtmann, Ex-Nazi Officer in Inquiry, Dies at 95
headline.print_headline: Erich Steidtmann, 95, Object Of Inquiry Into Role as Nazi
